name: Aboleth Thrall
description: The Aboleth Thrall is a Medium humanoid creature that showcases its connection to aquatic environments. It has average armor and hit points, making it a resilient opponent.
memorable: The ability to self-sacrifice for its master highlights its loyalty and protective nature.
goals: Serve and protect its master, the aboleth, while engaging in combat.
relations: Typically found accompanying aboleths or serving them.
environment: Commonly found in aquatic settings or near bodies of water.
strengths: Can breathe both air and water, making it versatile in different environments.
weaknesses: Requires moisture to avoid suffocation; can become incapacitated if it spends too much time dry.
attacks: Uses a Poison Ink Knife to deal slashing and significant poison damage to its enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Sea Changed allows it to survive in both air and water, but requires a bath in water after prolonged dryness.
senses: Passive perception of 10, allowing it to detect some environmental changes.
skills: No specific skill bonuses, reflecting a general proficiency.
additional_information: Magically charmed by the aboleth, reflecting deep loyalty.
Can communicate telepathically with aboleths over unlimited range.
Can perform a protective reaction to shield allies.
